alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; South Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 05 at 1:57PM MDT until November 06 at 1:00AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...West winds 40 to 50 MPH with gusts of 70 to 80 MPH. * WHERE...Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County and South Laramie Range, including the Bordeaux area. * WHEN...Until 1 AM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Widespread strong crosswinds will create dangerous travel for motorists on Interstate 25 between mile markers 60 and 80 as well as Interstate 80 between mile markers 320 and 345 especially those with light weight and high profile vehicles including camper trailers.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; South Laramie Range
